desc: API to allow Enterprise org admins to read the allow list of IP blocks and ASNs from the enterprise configuration.

trusted_cidr.desc: allow list of IPv4 addresses using cidr notation in the Enterprise organization configuration

trusted_asns.desc: allow list of Autonomous System Numbers (ASN) in the Enterprise organization configuration

endpoint_unavailable.desc: The requested endpoint is currently unavailable.

not_an_enterprise.desc: The user is not an enterprise admin.

unsupported_action_describe.desc: The user specified action is unsupported

unsupported_action_put.desc: The user specified action is unsupported
